articles.title: First monkeypox deaths reported outside of Africa - SBS News
articles.description: Prior to the two latest deaths, the World Health Organization recorded five deaths worldwide, all in Africa, as of 22 July.
articles.content: A man receives a vaccine against Monkeypox from a health professional at a medical centre in Barcelona, Spain on 26 July 2022. Source: AAP/Francisco Seco

articles.title: Monkeypox: First deaths outside Africa in Brazil and Spain - BBC
articles.description: Brazil and Spain report fatalities from the virus, but most infections are mild and overall risk is low.
articles.content:
